casebody.data:
Caleb HUDSON, Plaintiff,
v.
PASQUOTANK COUNTY; Randy Keaton, former Pasquotank County Manager in his official and individual capacities, The City of Elizabeth ; Elizabeth City Manager, Rich Olson, in his official and individual capacities; Harry Cannon, dba Mold Protection Services, Home Spec of NC, Inc., and Professional Laboratories, Inc., dba Pro-Lab, Defendants. No. COA18-115 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 6, 2018

REVERSED. REMANDED IN PART; AFFIRMED IN PART.
